title: These two dangerous Trojan 'dropper' Android apps have already been installed thousands of times
description: Two Trojans eith over 130,000 installs are being distributed to victims across Europe.

title: Telegram forced to crack down on paid posts because Apple wasn't getting a cut
description: Another victim of App Store guidelines, creators on the platform can no longer use third-party tools to earn money.

title: Bluesound’s new wireless speaker is like a supercharged Sonos One
description: The new Bluesound Pulse M is positioned to take on not just the Sonos One, but the pricier and more potent Sonos Five.

title: Microsoft warns Raspberry Robin malware is getting a lot sourer
description: The mysterious malware is no longer dormant, as it starts delivering various ransomware, Microsoft reveals.

title: You'll soon have to update Zoom a lot more frequently
description: Zoom will update its minimum software version every 90 days, forcing users to update more frequently.

title: Using Microsoft Teams on mobile should soon be a lot more enjoyable
description: Microsoft Teams on mobile is getting some pretty handy updates at last.

title: Worried about Nvidia RTX 4090 melting cables? Leaked RDNA 3 flagship pics could prove a tonic

title: This Google Docs update wants to solve your most embarrassing work problem
description: Better emoji functionalities are coming to Google Docs for that extra splash of personality.

title: There's a really good reason for your business not to use emotional analysis software
description: UK ICO advises companies to consider the biometric data they need to use, warns against collection and storage.

title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite Kids on AT&T gets you a rugged case and a bargain

title: MacBook Pro 2022 dreams dead as Apple rumored to delay launch
description: We were expecting new MacBooks with supercharged M2 silicon in November, but that isn’t happening...

title: These Microsoft servers are helping fuel massive DDoS attacks
description: Thousands of servers all over the world abused to serve as data amplifiers, genering tons of DDoS traffic.

title: Some businesses can't even tell if they've been hit by hackers
description: Although things are improving, a third of firms wouldn't be able to tell they'd been attacked until it was too late.

title: How to switch on a Halloween theme in Opera GX with this hidden code
description: Thanks to a new update, you can change your Opera GX theme to a pumpkin-flavored one.

title: Focal’s new outdoor speakers look like the rock trolls from Frozen and I want them

title: Nvidia RTX 4080 GPU early prices pop up – and there’s good and bad news

title: This new open-source tool is hunting for public AWS S3 buckets to spy on

title: Elon Musk's latest stupid Twitter idea could kill off the platform for good
description: New CEO Elon Musk confirmed that the verification process is being redesigned, but to pay to get a blue tick is just wrong.
